Geopolitical tensions and hopes for a US-China trade deal also weighed on the safe-haven metal, which lost nearly 6% in two sessions.

summary: Indian stocks reached 52-week highs, nearing all-time records, driven by optimism for an earnings revival and renewed foreign inflows. Expectations of strong festive demand, tax cuts, and policy support are fueling corporate profit growth. Hopes of an India-U.S. trade pact and FIIs turning buyers further boosted market sentiment.

title: Rupee rises 13 paise to 87.80 against US dollar in early trade
summary: The Indian Rupee gained 13 paise against the US Dollar in early trade today. Optimism surrounding a US-India trade deal boosted investor sentiment. Foreign fund inflows and a positive trend in domestic equities also supported the Rupee. Traders are watching global cues and economic data for further market direction. The Sensex and Nifty saw significant jumps in early trading.

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Oct 23: Vodafone Idea, Bharat Forge, Infosys, Birlasoft, Tata Elxsi among top gainers today
summary: Indian markets ended with modest gains as profit booking followed an optimistic start fueled by potential US tariff reductions on Indian goods. Nifty 50 and Sensex rose slightly, while broader indices underperformed, with sector performances mixed amid renewed trade tensions.

title: Stocks to buy: Nagaraj Shetti recommends IDFC First Bank, Central Bank shares to buy
summary: Domestic markets rallied on Thursday as Sensex and Nifty 50 benefitted from optimism over US-India trade talks and increased foreign investments. Nifty 50 approached its peak, with analysts noting a positive trend, while profit booking occurred later in the session.

title: Global funds ramp up Indian bonds purchase by 46 times to $631 million after RBI's rupee defence
summary: Foreign investors ramped up purchases of Indian government bonds by 46 times last week, an indication that aggressive currency intervention by the central bank is building market confidence.

title: Midwest IPO listing date tomorrow. Here’s what GMP signals about the Dalal Street debut
summary: Midwest IPO listing date is October 24, Friday, and the equity shares will be listed on both the stock exchanges, BSE and NSE. Ahead of the listing, Midwest IPO GMP today signals strong debut of shares in Indian stock market.

title: Shares to buy in short term: Mehta Equities’ Riyank suggests Bharti Airtel, Motilal Oswal, Paytm stock to buy
summary: Indian stock markets surged as optimism around a potential US-India trade agreement grew. The Nifty 50 index opened at 26,057.20, while the BSE Sensex reached 85,154.15. Analysts highlighted a meeting between US President Trump and PM Modi as a key factor for the upswing.

title: Sensex jumps over 700 points, Nifty 50 above 26,000; why is Indian stock market rising today? 5 key reasons
summary: Stock market today: The Sensex and Nifty 50 indexes have jumped about 3% in the previous five sessions, aided by stable Q2 results from banks and heavyweights such as Reliance Industries.

title: Nifty 50, Sensex today: What to expect from Indian stock market in trade on October 23 amid India-US trade deal buzz
summary: Nifty 50, Sensex today: The trends on Gift Nifty also indicate a huge gap-up start for the Indian benchmark index. The Gift Nifty was trading around 26,259 level, a premium of nearly 352 points from the Nifty futures’ previous close.
